level.heading: Report on grant program participation.
level.text: At the termination of each semester, the Trustees of the University shall furnish to the Council of the District of Columbia a statement of:
The number of persons who, during that semester, received tuition grants and participated in one or more courses pursuant to the provisions of this subchapter;
The total number of course enrollments attributable to these persons;

The number of individuals included in the response to paragraph (1) of this section who successfully completed each course, who dropped out, or who otherwise did not complete a course in which the individual had enrolled; and
The total amount of funds granted for the semester pursuant to this program to offset charges for tuition and required fees.
